abstract: The sheet presentation controller for the view controller.
overview:
## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewController/modalPresentationStyle] is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIModalPresentationStyle/pageSheet] or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIModalPresentationStyle/formSheet], this property contains a sheet presentation controller instance. Access this instance to customize or adjust the sheet before or after it presents.

If [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewController/modalPresentationStyle] has a value other than [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIModalPresentationStyle/pageSheet] or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIModalPresentationStyle/formSheet], the value of this property is `nil`.

# sheetPresentationController

**Instance Property**

The sheet presentation controller for the view controller.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var sheetPresentationController: UISheetPresentationController? { get }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewController/modalPresentationStyle] is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIModalPresentationStyle/pageSheet] or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIModalPresentationStyle/formSheet], this property contains a sheet presentation controller instance. Access this instance to customize or adjust the sheet before or after it presents.

If [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewController/modalPresentationStyle] has a value other than [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIModalPresentationStyle/pageSheet] or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIModalPresentationStyle/formSheet], the value of this property is `nil`.

## Adding a custom transition or presentation

- **transitioningDelegate**: The delegate object that provides transition animator, interactive controller, and custom presentation controller objects.
- **transitionCoordinator**: Returns the active transition coordinator object.
- **targetViewController(forAction:sender:)**: Returns the view controller that responds to the action.
- **presentationController**: The presentation controller that’s managing the current view controller.
- **popoverPresentationController**: The nearest popover presentation controller that is managing the current view controller.
- **activePresentationController**: The presentation controller that’s managing the view controller.
- **restoresFocusAfterTransition**: A Boolean value that indicates whether an item that previously was focused should again become focused when the item’s view controller becomes visible and focusable.
- **Customizing and resizing sheets in UIKit**: Discover how to create a layered and customized sheet experience in UIKit.
